backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing portfolio data with authorization, CRUD operations, and seed initialization for skills and projects.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a required update to the HomePage typing words list.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files including pages, hooks, components, and layouts.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router configuration setting up public and admin routes with theme provider and seed initialization.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI screen shown to users without admin access including message and return-home button.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button handling authentication state and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/controls/DarkMod: Theme toggle button switching between light and dark modes using next-themes.
Animated typing component cycling through provided words, supporting reduced-motion preferences.
frontend/src/components/layout/AdminLayo: Defines the admin layout with authentication checks, navigation links, and page structure for admin routes.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with copyright text and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/PublicLay: Provides the public site layout with navbar, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/PublicNav: Implements the public navigation bar with desktop and mobile menus and dark mode toggle.
frontend/src/components/projects/Project: Displays a project card with image, description, technologies, and optional links to demo or GitHub.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance, reinitializing on identity changes and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminGuard.ts: Determines admin access state by checking authentication and admin privileges.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminMutations.ts: Provides mutation hooks for creating, updating, and deleting admin-managed data like projects and skills.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminQueries.ts: Provides admin-related queries for messages, admin status, and user profile.
Handles submitting contact form messages through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInitializeSeed.ts: Initializes seed data if the caller is an admin and the actor is available.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login state and stored identity handling.
frontend/src/hooks/usePortfolioQueries.t: Defines React Query hooks to fetch portfolio data (about, skills, projects, experiences, and social links) from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers, theme variables, dark mode settings, base styles, and small utility/component classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app root, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Loads and displays the About content with a profile image and fallback skeletons.
Fetches and edits the About page content through a form using admin update mutations.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Renders admin navigation cards linking to various management sections like projects, skills, and messages.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminExperience: Manages CRUD operations for experience entries with dialogs for adding, editing, and deleting.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminMessagesPa: Displays contact messages with options to mark as read or delete, sorting them by creation date.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProjectsPa: Provides project management with creation, editing, and deletion using a dialog-driven form interface.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSkillsPage: Manages skills with CRUD operations, offering a dialog form for adding or editing skill details.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSocialLink: Admin page providing CRUD UI for social links using dialog forms and mutations.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact form with validation, submission handling, and displays social links with icons.
frontend/src/pages/ExperiencePage.tsx: Fetches and displays work experience entries with a timeline layout and skeleton placeholders.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the homepage hero section with typing animation and quick navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectsPage.tsx: Fetches and lists portfolio projects using ProjectCard components with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/SkillsPage.tsx: Displays grouped skills by category, showing skeletons while loading and skill cards once data loads.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, typography, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing architecture, feature requirements, and known issues.
